fields.name: Attributes and Abilities:
fields.value:
* Ultra-Powerful: You have 3 lives. If you would die, you instead lose a life. Lose all 3 lives and you die. This applies to hanging, which will reveal your role.
* Ultimate Savior!: Select a target each night. If they would die, you instead lose a life and protect them. You can protect them from literally anything including a modkill/ban.
* Ultimate Hero Man!: You win in a 1v1 situation against anyone else automatically.
